issue.title: old.reddit.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://old.reddit.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fold.reddit.com%2F) ### Comment > The multi-reddit pane on the left no longer expands when clicking on it. This is on the old reddit style. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://old.reddit.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fold.reddit.com) ### Comment Username: @kancelott > Sponsored posts/ads are appearing in the Reddit feed, despite Adguard being on. When I use uBlock Origin on Firefox, they don't appear. I have tried enabling the same filterlists I use in uBlock, but they still appear in Safari with Adguard. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4h5lqlu0feas4owo0wcswsggg4o8o004sir7esnl0c.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qxviz6q96qswggs4ws8ooswgcskgkcg8j4azfgjt0g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.11.0.1292 release Browser: | Safari Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `9.9.9.9`

issue.title: Zoechip3.com userules you guys told me to add are no longer working
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> The custom user rules you guys told me to add are no longer working every time I click the search bar or click a movie it opens a pop up 2. 

Please and thank you 

3. 
4. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
